title: FANET Secure Routing Protocol Design and Optimization Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental networking concepts, basic cryptography, and project management experience
context.additional_context: Practical-focused education combining wireless network security and mathematical optimization techniques

learning_goals: Explanation of core elements of secure routing protocols in FANET environments (Federated Learning, Blockchain, Cross-Layer Design)
Mathematical modeling and simulation of malware detection algorithms to prevent collaborative attacks
The routing path optimization problem reflecting QoS requirements (latency, number of hops, etc.) can be solved under constraints.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
